name: SendMeaSample
0:
”Alexa, Send Me a Sample”
”Alexa, ask Send Me a Sample”
”Alexa, open Send Me a Sample”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: send me a sample
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Whenever you see a brand featuring the Send Me a Sample logo, just say “Alexa, ask Send Me a Sample” and your product sample of choice will be delivered straight to your door, completely free. 
______________

To get started, create and link your Send Me a Sample account. You’ll only need to do this once and we’ll only send you the samples and vouchers that you’ve asked for. 
______________

Please note, some campaigns (such as alcohol related products) will be age-restricted, meaning you must be at least the minimum specified age in order to request a sample. If it’s an alcohol related product, you must be at least 18 years old to redeem in the UK or Ireland and at least 21 years old to redeem in the USA or Canada.
______________

Send Me a Sample uses information that you provide on registration to ship your sample. This may differ from the details in your Amazon account as Send Me a Sample is not affiliated with Amazon. Please ensure that, whenever you make an address change in your Amazon account, you also update your Send Me a Sample account too.
______________

Any problems? Get in touch with the team at hello@sendmeasample.net. Please allow 28 days for your samples to arrive.
